attributes.action: Introduce restrictions on foreign purchases of UK homes.
attributes.additional_details:
Despite what the property lobby claim, increasing the supply of houses will not reduce property prices in the SE. Extra supply simply increases the crisis by adding a population crisis on top of a housing crisis. The single biggest factor in the rise of house prices to their current incredible levels is the growth of a vast foreign buyer segment which has fatally distorted the market in the SE. 

See this recent report on the issue by Civitas.
http://www.civitas.org.uk/press/PRshelter.html
attributes.background: We call on the UK Government to follow Australia, Denmark, Singapore, Switzerland and many other countries by introducing restrictions on foreign purchases of UK homes.
